feed.title: Nextcloud News Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Nextcloud News: 25.0.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Build(deps-dev): Bump stylelint-webpack-plugin from 4.1.1 to 5.0.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2747
  • Build(deps-dev): Bump @typescript-eslint/eslint-plugin from 8.14.0 to 8.15.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2890
  • Build(deps-dev): Bump @nextcloud/babel-config from 1.0.0 to 1.2.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2892
  • Build(deps-dev): Bump vue-multiselect from 3.0.0 to 3.1.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2893
  • never tag a release as nightly in the appstore by @Grotax in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2894
  • deps: update @nextcloud/router to 3.0.1 and @nextcloud/dialogs to 6.0.1 by @wofferl in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2879
  • Build(deps-dev): Bump webpack from 5.94.0 to 5.96.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2897
  • Build(deps-dev): Bump @babel/preset-typescript from 7.25.7 to 7.26.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2898
  • Build(deps-dev): Bump focus-trap from 7.6.0 to 7.6.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2899
  • Build(deps-dev): Bump eslint-plugin-vue from 9.29.0 to 9.31.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2906
  • Build(deps-dev): Bump ts-jest from 29.2.4 to 29.2.5 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2905
  • Build(deps): Bump @nextcloud/vue from 8.20.0 to 8.21.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2910
  • Build(deps-dev): Bump @types/lodash from 4.14.202 to 4.17.13 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2911
  • Build(deps-dev): Bump @typescript-eslint/parser from 8.14.0 to 8.15.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2912
  • Set of fixes for 25.0.0 by @wofferl in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2913
  • dev-deps: remove unused devDependencies by @wofferl in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2914
  • Replace old screenshots by @Grotax in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2915
  • Release 25.0.1 by @Grotax in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2917

Full Changelog: https://github.com/nextcloud/news/compare/25.0.0...25.0.1

entry.title: New release for Nextcloud News: 25.0.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • small accessibility fixes by @wofferl in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2921
  • Downgrade htmlpurifier to 4.17.0 by @Grotax in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2924
  • Release 25.0.2 by @Grotax in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2926

Full Changelog: https://github.com/nextcloud/news/compare/25.0.1...25.0.2

entry.title: New release for Nextcloud News: 25.0.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Build(deps-dev): Bump @types/webpack-env from 1.18.4 to 1.18.5 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2928
  • Build(deps-dev): Bump eslint-plugin-import from 2.29.1 to 2.31.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2929
  • Build(deps-dev): Bump typescript from 5.6.3 to 5.7.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2930
  • dev-deps: update @typescript-eslint to 8.16.0 with support added for typescript 5.7 by @wofferl in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2933
  • Move subscribe button to search area of Navigation by @lgabardos in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2932
  • Build(deps-dev): Bump axios from 1.7.7 to 1.7.8 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2937
  • Change items list style in compact mode to improve readability (and better match v24's style) by @a-mair in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2938
  • Improve key navigation and tabbing by @wofferl in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2934
  • Release 25.0.3 by @Grotax in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2941

New Contributors

  • @lgabardos made their first contribution in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2932
  • @a-mair made their first contribution in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2938

Full Changelog: https://github.com/nextcloud/news/compare/25.0.2...25.0.3

entry.title: New release for Nextcloud News: 25.1.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [Actions] Frontend tests do not try to install firefox by @Grotax in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2942
  • Build(deps): Bump @nextcloud/password-confirmation from 5.1.1 to 5.3.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2947
  • Screenreader fixes by @wofferl in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2946
  • fix: remove mime type check when importing opml by @wofferl in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2951
  • Display modes and screen reader mode by @wofferl in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2950
  • Fixes 25.0.3 by @wofferl in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2952
  • Release 25.1.0 by @Grotax in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2953

Full Changelog: https://github.com/nextcloud/news/compare/25.0.3...25.1.0

entry.title: New release for Nextcloud News: 25.1.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • reactivate tests by @Grotax in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2954
  • Build(deps): Bump fivefilters/readability.php from 3.2.0 to 3.3.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2958
  • Build(deps-dev): Bump eslint-plugin-vue from 9.31.0 to 9.32.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2959
  • Build(deps-dev): Bump @typescript-eslint/eslint-plugin from 8.16.0 to 8.17.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2963
  • Build(deps-dev): Bump @typescript-eslint/parser from 8.16.0 to 8.17.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2962
  • Build(deps-dev): Bump phpunit/phpunit from 9.6.21 to 9.6.22 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2971
  • Show red error bubble only if more than 50 updates failed. by @a-mair in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2955
  • Build(deps-dev): Bump axios from 1.7.8 to 1.7.9 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2967
  • Build(deps-dev): Bump webpack from 5.96.1 to 5.97.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2970
  • Build(deps-dev): Bump @typescript-eslint/parser from 8.17.0 to 8.18.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2972
  • Build(deps): Bump nanoid from 3.3.6 to 3.3.8 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2974
  • Build(deps-dev): Bump @typescript-eslint/eslint-plugin from 8.17.0 to 8.18.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2973
  • Build(deps-dev): Bump eslint-import-resolver-webpack from 0.13.9 to 0.13.10 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2976
  • Build(deps-dev): Bump jsesc from 3.0.2 to 3.1.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2975
  • Build(deps): Bump @nextcloud/moment from 1.3.1 to 1.3.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2980
  • Accessibility improvements by @wofferl in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2965
  • feat: emulate structural heading navigation to workaround problems with screen readers and the dynamic scroll by @wofferl in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2978
  • fix: Items read on other devices do not disappear on pressing 'r' by @wofferl in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2981
  • Release 25.1.1 by @Grotax in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2983

Full Changelog: https://github.com/nextcloud/news/compare/25.1.0...25.1.1
